message: We step through the door into a city gleaming white.
The streets and buildings are simple and clean, with none of the clutter or chaos you would see back home.
And the sky is filled with glittering stars, another sight you'd never see in the Old Residential District.
Both the weather and time of day are artificially controlled in Platinum Jail. I've heard it's almost always night inside.
Supposedly the idea is to make it feel like a party every day, or make it more relaxing or something...
But the most prominent thing in the sky is the tower--the symbol of Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's Oval Tower..."
I've heard the rumors, but this is my first time seeing it.
Toue created this world...
Just knowing that is enough to make everything seem phony.
However convenient or beautiful it might be, I can't bring myself to like this perfect, polished world.
It's all so... cold.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren?"
I look down. Ren is panting, his tongue hanging out.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes. I just used a little too much energy. Nothing serious."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But you look awful. That ganking must've really done a number on you. We should go somewhere I can check you out... Oh, I know."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Didn't that invitation come with a place to stay?"
I open the invitation on my Coil and check the attached map.
An area is marked in red.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I dunno if it's a hotel or what, but let's check it out. Can you give me directions, Ren?"

name: 蓮
message: "I can manage that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks."
I start down the street, following Ren's directions.
